title: ess权限问题
author: Tommer
txt_content:
怎么去掉nick和me的权限  我打mangdelp Builder essentials.me   没用
打了之后说 the group doesn't have direct access to that permission.

replies.author: Tommer
replies.txt_content:
807765502 发表于 2016-4-22 21:42
添加负权限  /mangaddp builder -essentials.me
                /mangaddp builder -essentials.nick ...
我去负权限都有 我怎么不知道呢6666

replies.author: miejun
replies.txt_content:
在所要删除的权限前面加 - 
就可以删除权限
the group doesn't have direct access to that permission. 
该组没有直接访问该权限。应该是没有这个权限
